data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 2, Anthony Martial (Man Utd) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
David Coote awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Man Utd.
Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in Manchester.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 4, David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich's Grady Diangana is whistled for offside at Old Trafford.
In the minute 5, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 7, David Coote signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at Old Trafford.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
David Coote signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Anthony Martial gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Throw-in Man Utd.
West Bromwich push forward at Old Trafford and Karlan Ahearne-Grant gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Branislav Ivanovic's header is off-target for West Bromwich.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick West Bromwich.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can West Bromwich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at Old Trafford.
In the minute 30, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
David Coote signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Man Utd's half.
David Coote signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to West Bromwich's area.
In the minute 32, Throw-in West Bromwich.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of West Bromwich.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 36, Man Utd's Harry Maguire gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Old Trafford.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 39, Free kick Man Utd.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In Manchester, Grady Diangana of West Bromwich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
West Bromwich's Kyle Bartley attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
David Coote awards Man Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 45, David Coote signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
David Coote will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Marcus Rashford of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Manchester West Bromwich drive forward through Conor Townsend. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Man Utd have been awarded a penalty in Manchester...
In the minute 56, Goal! Bruno Fernandes gives Man Utd a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Matheus Pereira for West Bromwich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 59, Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, West Bromwich make their first substitution with Hal Robson-Kanu replacing Grady Diangana.
The away team replace Karlan Ahearne-Grant with Callum Robinson.
Edinson Cavani is replacing Juan Mata for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 63, David Coote signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
David Coote signals a Man Utd throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Old Trafford.
In the minute 64, Free kick Man Utd.
Callum Robinson hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for West Bromwich in Manchester.
Edinson Cavani of Man Utd is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 67, Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd's Alex Telles breaks free at Old Trafford. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 68, David Coote awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of West Bromwich.
Important block from the West Bromwich defence as Edinson Cavani fires in a strike for Man Utd.
In the minute 71, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Harry Maguire for Man Utd drives towards goal at Old Trafford. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 72, Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
David Coote signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to West Bromwich's area.
Edinson Cavani (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 72, David Coote signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Conor Gallagher (West Bromwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 77, In Manchester Man Utd attack through Alex Telles. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at Old Trafford.
David Coote signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in Manchester.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 79, The away team have replaced Branislav Ivanovic with Filip Krovinovic. This is the third substitution made today by Slaven Bilic.
Donny van de Beek is on a sub for Marcus Rashford for Man Utd.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
In the minute 80, David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 83, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Scott McTominay is replacing Fred for the home team.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 87, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 89, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of West Bromwich.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In Manchester, Anthony Martial of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Edinson Cavani for Man Utd has been booked by David Coote and receives a first yellow card.
